oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Angebot und Nachfrage fuer Oekofuttermittel in der EU
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Padel, Susanne
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Regulation
Markets and trade
Feeding and growth
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The paper is a summary of a longer report of the same question. It sets out briefly the situation of countries and certifiers to the challenge of moving to 1005 organic rations for livestock, presents a calcualtion of the balance between supply (based on land area and average yields) for organic cereals and pulses grown in the EU and the demand (based on typical rations for several categories of livestock).
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Padel, Susanne (2005) Angebot und Nachfrage fuer Oekofuttermittel in der EU. [Supply and demand of organic feed in the EU.] Oekologie und Landbau, 136 (4), pp. 39-40.
